Listen to Episode 162 Here
What to Expect From Episode 162
In this episode, we explore:
CSA Scores & FMCSA Audits: How to monitor your scores and what to do if they start creeping up.
Types of Audits: Understanding the difference between comprehensive and focused audits.
Audit Process: What documents are required and how to handle virtual audits.
Safety Ratings: The implications of Satisfactory, Conditional, and Unsatisfactory ratings on your operations.
Examples of Audits and Letters can be found HERE.
Best Practices to Stay Out of Trouble
To keep your company out of the FMCSA’s crosshairs, it’s crucial to:
Regularly monitor your CSA scores and dispute any inaccuracies.
Maintain a rigorous vehicle maintenance schedule.
Closely monitor driver performance and maintain up-to-date records.
Implement thorough hiring and screening processes.

Aby Twoja firma nie znalazła się na celowniku FMCSA, kluczowe jest:
